definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: On reformation of post-doctoral tenure systems in higher education institutions;
sentences.chinese: 博士后制度在世界已有约一百多年的历史。

sentences.english: She is now a postdoctoral fellow at Washington University.
sentences.chinese: 她现在是华盛顿大学的博士后。

sentences.english: I think you must know my friend in New York work as a post-doc.
sentences.chinese: 我想你应该知道我的朋友在纽约工作的博士后。

sentences.english: Postdoctoral stations have been sep up in all of the 3 first-class subjects of TCM in the Academy.
sentences.chinese: 博士后站已经构建在所有的三个一流学科对中医学院。

sentences.english: Fuzhi Cheng is a postdoctoral fellow at Cornell University.
sentences.chinese: 成富智是康乃尔大学博士后研究员。

sentences.english: She used to be a visiting scholar for post-doctoral research in Harvard University.
sentences.chinese: 曾到美国哈佛大学做博士后访问学者。

sentences.english: The ease of getting a postdoc is correlated with the amount of independent research monies available.
sentences.chinese: 拿到博士后的容易程度是与能拿到钱的多少相关的。

sentences.english: He anticipates exchanges of PhD and post-doctoral students between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 他期待着交换两国的博士生和博士后。

sentences.english: Then, it presents measures to reform China's Post-doctoral Science Fund.
sentences.chinese: 对中国博士后科学基金的改革提出具体措施。

sentences.english: After earning his doctorate, he took up a series of professorships.
sentences.chinese: 他获得博士后，开始担任一连串的教授职位。

sentences.english: What are some of the satisfactions and pressures you feel as a postdoc here?
sentences.chinese: 什么是一些满意度和压力，一个博士后你觉得呢？

sentences.english: Postdoctoral research experience in the field of atmospheric science is a definite advantage.
sentences.chinese: 有大气科学领域博士后研究的经验优先考虑。

sentences.english: in particular a post doc that's also interested in doing things in economics and game theory.
sentences.chinese: 也对经济和博弈理论感兴趣的人，特别是博士后。

sentences.english: A sound system and procedures of post-doctoral management have been set up.
sentences.chinese: 制定了完善的博士后管理办法和管理流程。

sentences.english: In 2003, it is allowed the establishment of art school post-doctoral research station.
sentences.chinese: 2003年获准建立艺术学博士后流动站。

sentences.english: Traffic and transportation engineering disciplines with a post-doctoral research station.
sentences.chinese: 交通运输工程一级学科设有博士后流动站。

definition: master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
